opg1

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • opg1.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount(double initialBalance)
      Creates an object of the class with an inital balance and a unique id which automatically increments every time a new object is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(double amount)
      Mutates the balance by adding the parameter amount to the current balance.
      double getBalance()
      Accesses the balance and returns it.
      int getId()
      Accesses the id and returns it.
      void withdraw(double amount)
      Mutates the balance by subtracting the parameter amount from the current balance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount(double initialBalance)
        Creates an object of the class with an inital balance and a unique id which automatically increments every time a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        initialBalance - a double determining the initial balance of the bank account.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit(double amount)
        Mutates the balance by adding the parameter amount to the current balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - a double specifying the amount to add to the account(amount > 0).

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(double amount)
        Mutates the balance by subtracting the parameter amount from the current balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - a double specifying the amount to add to the account(amount > 0).

        Accesses the balance and returns it.

        Accesses the id and returns it.
